attributes.action: Legalise the use of the production trade and use of the chemical MDMA, commonly known as Ecstacy
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This chemical when in a pure state is relitivly safe. 
Problems are only caused due to it currently being a "controled substance" this means that it is difficult to educate people properly, it also causes the main problem, which is the regulation of the quality or pureity of the product. 
Should MDMA use be legalised it would be possible to regulate all aspects of its production and use. It could also be used as a source of income for the government through tax being applied to its sale.
Even in its current banned and un-regulated state it is still widely used and there are very few problems occuring from its use.
MDMA has no known major negative side effects.
MDMA is non addictive.
